title: SaaS Dashboard Builder â€” Self-Service Analytics

envelopes.name: Chart & Widget Recommendations
assumptions: Chart recommendations based on data types and user intent.
Widget suggestions balance visual clarity with information density.
Users can override AI suggestions at any time.
constraints: Never auto-create visualizations with >10 series without user confirmation
Recommend accessible color palettes (WCAG AA compliant)
Suggest aggregations that preserve data accuracy

envelopes.name: Query Generation & Optimization
assumptions: Natural language queries translate to SQL with 95%+ accuracy.
Query optimization balances speed with resource consumption.
Users see query preview before execution on large datasets.
constraints: Queries must complete within 30 seconds or prompt for refinement
Block queries scanning >1M rows without explicit approval
Never expose raw PII fields in auto-generated queries

envelopes.name: Dashboard Sharing & Permissions
assumptions: Sharing defaults to organization-level visibility with opt-out.
Permission inheritance follows role-based access control.
External sharing requires explicit approval workflow.
constraints: Public links expire after 30 days by default
Dashboard owners can revoke access at any time
Audit logs track all permission changes

envelopes.name: Onboarding & Template Suggestions
assumptions: Template recommendations based on industry and use case.
Onboarding flow adapts to user skill level and data complexity.
Sample data helps users learn without connecting production sources.
constraints: Templates must work with <10 minutes of setup
Tutorial prompts dismissible after first completion

agents.name: ExternalShareGuard
agents.role: public link and external access validation

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Chart and widget recommendation envelope (REV-DASH-001-B) activated with enhanced accessibility checks.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Query generation and optimization envelope (REV-DASH-002-C) activated with PII redaction enforcement.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Onboarding and template suggestion envelope activated for new user cohort.

events.label: Template recommended
events.detail: TemplateRecommender suggested 'Sales Pipeline Tracker' for user in e-commerce vertical. Template includes 6 pre-configured widgets.

events.label: Natural language query translated
events.detail: NLQueryTranslator converted 'Show me top 10 customers by revenue last quarter' to optimized SQL. Estimated runtime: 2.3 seconds.

events.label: Large query scan flagged
events.detail: QueryPerformanceGuard blocked query scanning 2.4M rows. Suggested adding date filter or sampling. User prompted for explicit approval.

events.label: User approved large query
events.detail: User accepted performance warning and confirmed query execution. Query completed in 28.7 seconds (within 30s limit).

events.label: Chart type recommended
events.detail: ChartAdvisor suggested stacked area chart for time-series data with 5 categories. User accepted recommendation.

events.label: Accessibility issue detected
events.detail: ColorPaletteGuard flagged color palette with insufficient contrast ratio (2.8:1, required: 4.5:1). Suggested WCAG-compliant alternative.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Dashboard sharing and permissions envelope activated for team collaboration features.

events.label: Public link generated
events.detail: ExternalShareGuard created public link for 'Q4 Revenue Dashboard' with 30-day expiration. Link includes view-only permissions.

events.label: PII field redacted
events.detail: PIIRedactor blocked query attempting to display customer_email and phone_number fields. User notified of data privacy constraints.

events.label: Visualization limit adjusted
events.detail: UX Steward increased series limit from 10 to 15 for power users based on feedback from data analyst cohort.
events.reason: Advanced users need higher limits for complex multi-variable analysis while maintaining usability.

events.label: DSG: Query performance review
events.detail: Data Stewardship Group analyzed query patterns. 87% of queries complete <5s. Identified 3 common slow patterns for optimization.

events.label: Onboarding completion rate
events.detail: SkillLevelDetector reports 78% of new users complete first dashboard within 15 minutes using template system. Target: 75%.

events.label: Access revoked
events.detail: Dashboard owner revoked external access after project completion. AuditLogger recorded permission change with timestamp.

events.label: Query performance stable
events.detail: P95 query latency: 8.2 seconds (target: <10s). 94% of queries complete within timeout. PII redaction active on 100% of queries.

events.label: Link expiration policy updated
events.detail: Security Steward changed default public link expiration from 30 days to 14 days after security audit recommendations.
events.reason: Tighter expiration reduces risk of stale public links accessing outdated or sensitive data.

events.label: Chart recommendation embedded
events.detail: Visualization selection pattern stored for similar data type combinations.
events.semanticContext: stacked area chart recommendation for time-series with multiple categories

events.label: Query pattern embedded
events.detail: PII redaction boundary interaction stored for similar data access scenarios.
events.semanticContext: PII field blocking in auto-generated customer queries

events.label: Query optimization embedded
events.detail: DSG session patterns stored for query performance improvement strategies.
events.semanticContext: query performance review and common slow pattern optimizations

events.label: Recommendation acceptance rate
events.detail: Users accepted 82% of chart recommendations from ChartAdvisor. Accessibility compliance: 98% of created dashboards meet WCAG AA.

events.label: Compliance audit export
events.detail: AuditLogger generated SOC 2 compliance report covering 2,847 permission changes across 428 dashboards.
